goals__remit:
Outotec provides leading technologies and services for the sustainable use of Earth's natural resources. As the global leader in minerals and metals processing technology, we have developed many breakthrough technologies over the decades for our customers in metals and mining industry. We also provide innovative solutions for industrial water treatment, the utilization of alternative energy sources and the chemical industry. With a global network of sales and service centers, research facilities and 4,146 experts, Outotec generated annual sales of approximately EUR 1.1 billion in 2017. Outotec shares are listed on NASDAQ Helsinki.  
www.outotec.com
